languages.text: Лучшие умы династии фон Валанциус взялись за изучение тассерция. Вскоре нашлось множество применений этому естественному псифокусу, но ликование длилось недолго: несколько крупных варп-прорывов в местах, куда экспортировали тассерций, свели на нет все благие намерения по его исследованию. Люди принялись рьяно изничтожать все, что хоть отдаленно напоминало тассерций, но несколько могучих псайкеров смогли поставить проклятый камень себе на службу — многократно усилив свою колдовскую мощь и став угрозой, с которой Простор отныне должен считаться.

All the best minds in the service of House von Valancius took up the study of thassertium. Numerous uses were soon found for the natural psy-focus, but the jubilation was short-lived, as a series of major warp breaches in thassertium export destinations put an end to any and all goodwill toward the research. People began zealously destroying anything that remotely resembled the mineral. However, a few exceptionally strong psykers managed to bend the sinister rock to their will, magnifying their sorcerous powers severalfold and turning them into a force the Expanse has had to reckon with ever since.
languages.original_text: Лучшие умы династии фон Валанциус взялись за изучение тассерция. Вскоре нашлось множество применений этому естественному псифокусу, но ликование длилось недолго: несколько крупных варп-прорывов в местах, куда экспортировали тассерций, свели на нет все благие намерения по его исследованию. traits.locale_text: The best minds of House von Valancius took up the study of thassertium. Numerous uses were soon found for the natural psy-focus, but the jubilation was short-lived as a series of major warp breaches in thassertium export destinations put an end to any and all goodwill toward the research. People began zealously destroying anything that remotely resembled thassertium. However, a few exceptionally strong psykers managed to make the sinister rock do their bidding, magnifying their sorcerous powers severalfold and turning them into a force the Expanse had to reckon with since.

languages.text: Die klügsten Köpfe im Dienste des Hauses Valancius widmeten sich dem Studium von Thassertium. Für den natürlichen Psi-Fokus wurden zahlreiche Anwendungen gefunden, aber der Jubel darüber währte nur kurz, denn eine Reihe von Warprissen in Zielorten für den Thassertium-Export bereitete der Forschungsarbeit ein jähes Ende. Die Menschen zerstörten daraufhin eifrig alles, was auch nur entfernt mit dem Mineral zu tun hatte. Dennoch gelang es einigen außergewöhnlich starken Psionikern, den unheimlichen Stein ihrem Willen zu unterwerfen. Sie erhöhten ihre magischen Kräfte um ein Vielfaches und wurden zu einer Macht, die der Ausdehnung seither immer wieder Probleme macht.
languages.original_text: All the best minds in the service of House von Valancius took up the study of thassertium. Numerous uses were soon found for the natural psy-focus, but the jubilation was short-lived, as a series of major warp breaches in thassertium export destinations put an end to any and all goodwill toward the research. People began zealously destroying anything that remotely resembled the mineral. However, a few exceptionally strong psykers managed to bend the sinister rock to their will, magnifying their sorcerous powers severalfold and turning them into a force the Expanse has had to reckon with ever since.

traits.locale_text: Die klügsten Köpfe im Dienste des Hauses Valancius widmeten sich dem Studium von Thassertium. Für den natürlichen Psi-Fokus wurden zahlreiche Anwendungen gefunden, aber der Jubel darüber währte nur kurz, denn eine Reihe von Warprissen in Zielorten für den Thassertium-Export bereitete der Forschungsarbeit ein jähes Ende. Die Menschen zerstörten daraufhin eifrig alles, was auch nur entfernt mit dem Mineral zu tun hatte. Dennoch gelang es einigen außergewöhnlich starken Psionikern, den unheimlichen Stein ihrem Willen zu unterwerfen. Sie erhöhten ihre magischen Kräfte um ein Vielfaches und wurden zu einer Macht, die der Ausdehnung seither immer wieder Probleme macht.

languages.text: Les plus grands érudits de la maison von Valancius se lancèrent dans une étude approfondie du thassertium et lui trouvèrent très vite des propriétés naturelles de focalisateur psychique. Mais leur joie fut de courte durée ; une série d'intrusions majeures du Warp dans les destinations d'exportation du thassertium mit rapidement fin à toute velléité de recherches, et tout ce qui ressemblait de près ou de loin au minerai fut alors systématiquement détruit. Seuls quelques psykers exceptionnellement doués parvinrent à plier la roche à leur volonté, démultipliant leurs pouvoirs surnaturels, devenant par là même une force non négligeable dans les Étendues.
languages.original_text: All the best minds in the service of House von Valancius took up the study of thassertium. Numerous uses were soon found for the natural psy-focus, but the jubilation was short-lived, as a series of major warp breaches in thassertium export destinations put an end to any and all goodwill toward the research. People began zealously destroying anything that remotely resembled the mineral. However, a few exceptionally strong psykers managed to bend the sinister rock to their will, magnifying their sorcerous powers severalfold and turning them into a force the Expanse has had to reckon with ever since.

Mais leur joie fut de courte durée ; une série d'intrusions majeures du Warp dans les destinations d'exportation du thassertium mit rapidement fin à toute velléité de recherches, et tout ce qui ressemblait de près ou de loin au minerai fut alors systématiquement détruit. Seuls quelques psykers exceptionnellement doués parvinrent à plier la roche à leur volonté, démultipliant leurs pouvoirs surnaturels, devenant par là même une force non négligeable dans les Étendues.

languages.text: 整个冯·瓦兰修斯王朝头脑最聪慧的人都开始研究起塔瑟拉水晶。很快，人们就发现这种天然灵能媒介可以在众多方面派上用场。然而，这种喜悦很快就消散了，因为塔瑟拉水晶采矿地点附近发生了一系列亚空间侵袭事故，造成了严重后果。此后，所有人对相关研究都唯恐避之不及。人们狂热地销毁这种水晶，摧毁一切与它有相似之处的物质。不过，少数极为强大的灵能者成功地驾驭了这种邪恶水晶的强大力量，巫术能力也因此增强了许多倍，成为了科罗努斯扩区不容忽视的存在。
languages.original_text: All the best minds in the service of House von Valancius took up the study of thassertium. Numerous uses were soon found for the natural psy-focus, but the jubilation was short-lived, as a series of major warp breaches in thassertium export destinations put an end to any and all goodwill toward the research. People began zealously destroying anything that remotely resembled the mineral. However, a few exceptionally strong psykers managed to bend the sinister rock to their will, magnifying their sorcerous powers severalfold and turning them into a force the Expanse has had to reckon with ever since.

整个冯·瓦兰修斯王朝头脑最聪慧的人都开始研究起了塔瑟拉水晶。很快，人们就发现这种天然灵能媒介可以在众多方面派上用场。然而，这种喜悦很快就消散了，因为塔瑟拉水晶采矿地点附近发生了一系列亚空间侵袭事故，造成了严重后果。此后，所有人对相关研究都唯恐避之不及。人们狂热地销毁这种水晶，摧毁一切与它有相似之处的物质。不过，少数极为强大的灵能者成功地驾驭了这种邪恶水晶的强大力量，巫术能力也因此增强了许多倍，成为了科罗努斯扩区不容忽视的存在。

languages.text: Las mejores mentes al servicio de la casa von Valancius se dedicaron al estudio del thassertio. No tardaron en encontrarse diversos usos para este foco psíquico natural, pero la alegría fue efímera: una serie de brechas de la disformidad en los destinos de exportación de thassertio acabó con todo el optimismo que despertaba la investigación. La gente comenzó a destruir con fervor todo lo remotamente similar al mineral. Sin embargo, unos pocos psíquicos de voluntad excepcional lograron someter la siniestra roca a su poder, multiplicando sus capacidades de hechicería y convirtiéndolos en una fuerza a la que la Extensión ha debido enfrentarse desde entonces.
languages.original_text: All the best minds in the service of House von Valancius took up the study of thassertium. Numerous uses were soon found for the natural psy-focus, but the jubilation was short-lived, as a series of major warp breaches in thassertium export destinations put an end to any and all goodwill toward the research. People began zealously destroying anything that remotely resembled the mineral. However, a few exceptionally strong psykers managed to bend the sinister rock to their will, magnifying their sorcerous powers severalfold and turning them into a force the Expanse has had to reckon with ever since.

traits.locale_text: Las mejores mentes al servicio de la casa von Valancius se dedicaron al estudio del thassertio. No tardaron en encontrarse diversos usos para este foco psíquico natural, pero la alegría fue efímera: una serie de brechas de la disformidad en los destinos de exportación de thassertio acabó con todo el optimismo que despertaba la investigación. La gente comenzó a destruir con fervor todo lo remotamente similar al mineral. Sin embargo, unos pocos psíquicos de voluntad excepcional lograron someter la siniestra roca a su poder, multiplicando sus capacidades de hechicería y convirtiéndolos en una fuerza a la que la Extensión ha debido enfrentarse desde entonces.

languages.text: フォン・ヴァランシウス家に仕える最高の頭脳たちが、タッセリウムの研究に取り組んだ。天然の超能力集中物質として多くの用途がすぐに見つかったが、祝賀ムードは長く続かなかった。タッセリウムの輸出先で一連の大規模な〈歪み〉の裂け目が発生し、研究に対する好意は完全に失われたのだ。人々はその鉱物にわずかでも似ているものを熱心に破壊し始めた。しかし、ごくわずかな非常に強力な異能者たちは、この邪悪な岩を意のままに操り、その魔術的な力を数倍に増幅させた。そしてそれ以来、その力はエクスパンスで無視できない存在となった。
languages.original_text: All the best minds in the service of House von Valancius took up the study of thassertium. Numerous uses were soon found for the natural psy-focus, but the jubilation was short-lived, as a series of major warp breaches in thassertium export destinations put an end to any and all goodwill toward the research. People began zealously destroying anything that remotely resembled the mineral. However, a few exceptionally strong psykers managed to bend the sinister rock to their will, magnifying their sorcerous powers severalfold and turning them into a force the Expanse has had to reckon with ever since.

traits.locale_text: フォン・ヴァランシウス家に仕える最高の頭脳たちが、タッセリウムの研究に取り組んだ。天然の超能力集中物質として多くの用途がすぐに見つかったが、祝賀ムードは長く続かなかった。タッセリウムの輸出先で一連の大規模な〈歪み〉の裂け目が発生し、研究に対する好意は完全に失われたのだ。人々はその鉱物にわずかでも似ているものを熱心に破壊し始めた。しかし、ごくわずかな非常に強力な異能者たちは、この邪悪な岩を意のままに操り、その魔術的な力を数倍に増幅させた。そしてそれ以来、その力はエクスパンスで無視できない存在となった。

languages.text: Von Valancius Hanesi'nin hizmetindeki en keskin zihinler, tasertiyum üzerine çalışmaya başladı. Kısa sürede bu doğal ruhsezi odağının kullanılabileceği sayısız alan keşfedildi ancak tasertiyum ihracat noktalarında meydana gelen bir dizi büyük öteboyut yarığının, araştırmaya yönelik tüm iyi niyeti yerle bir etmesinden dolayı bu coşku pek uzun sürmedi. İnsanlar, bu uğursuz minerali uzaktan yakından andıran her şeyi büyük bir gözü karalıkla yok etmeye başladı. Ancak olağanüstü kudretli birkaç ruhsezer, bu habis kayanın iradelerine boyun eğmesini sağlayarak büyü güçlerini katbekat artırdı. Böylece bu ruhsezerler, Enginlik'in o andan itibaren görmezden gelemeyeceği bir kuvvete dönüştü.
languages.original_text: All the best minds in the service of House von Valancius took up the study of thassertium. Numerous uses were soon found for the natural psy-focus, but the jubilation was short-lived, as a series of major warp breaches in thassertium export destinations put an end to any and all goodwill toward the research. People began zealously destroying anything that remotely resembled the mineral. However, a few exceptionally strong psykers managed to bend the sinister rock to their will, magnifying their sorcerous powers severalfold and turning them into a force the Expanse has had to reckon with ever since.

Böylece bu ruhsezerler, Enginlik'in o andan itibaren görmezden gelemeyeceği bir kuvvete dönüştü.
